metadata.title: Zooplankton Biomass Data Around Japan
metadata.description: To provide investigators with an integrated data set of quality-controlled, globally distributed plankton abundance, biomass and composition data, along with co-sampled environmental data.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To provide investigators with an integrated data set of quality-controlled, globally distributed plankton abundance, biomass and composition data, along with co-sampled environmental data.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None Planned

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: Cite the COPEPOD Database and the original PI when available.

Distribution liability: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system.
